version_description: We have added translations to many languages and also new enemies that will try to kill you - big robots and army. You may get these robots from watching reward ads. But there is a chance that you get only sports car or other military vehicle
We have added new way of transport - skateboard. We removed old quests and we have made brand new quests that are much more interesting.

- We fixed some quests.
- Optimization to prevent game crash on older devices.
- On devices below 2 Gb ram, it is not recommended to play the game on High and Very High graphics settings. Otherwise, there is a risk of falls.
For example, on the iPhone 5S or 6, play Low or Medium graphics settings. It depends on how many background apps you have running.
- Further optimizations are planned in future updates.

- new minigame - hairdresser
- new shop environment
- new costume skins
- new character attachments - hats, glasses, masks
- car glass can be destroyed
- trees, bushes can burn
- fences can be destroyed
- many fixed bugs

2 new casino games - Blackjack, Rulette
Lootboxes - You can buy lootboxes, that will contain multiple items based on price of the box. There is a probability for each of set of items.
Air tracks - new mini game with cars
Air tracks - new mini game with cars
We have fixed a bug with black screen
